    • Constructor Detail

      • I2cManager

        public I2cManager(com.google.android.things.pio.PeripheralManager manager,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  int address)
        Constructor checks that the peripheral exists and initializes it for use.
        Parameters:
        manager - the peripheral manager from the calling activity
        name - the name of the I2C bus to use
        address - the address of the peripheral device connected to the bus

    • Method Detail

      • closeDevice

        public void closeDevice()
        Free the device resources when closing down the application. Checks that we can close the device and does so if possible.

      • writeByteToDevice

        public boolean writeByteToDevice(byte address,
                                 byte data)
        Writes a byte to the specified address on the peripheral
        Parameters:
        address - of the register to write to
        data - to write to the device
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • readByteFromDevice

        public int[] readByteFromDevice(int address)
        Reads a byte from the device connected to the I2C bus
        Parameters:
        address - the register address to access
        Returns:
        the byte that was read from the device
